trans-unit.source: Provides methods and attached properties that support data validation.
trans-unit.target: 提供方法和支持数据验证的附加的属性。

trans-unit.source: For a detailed discussion of the validation process, see "Data Validation" in [Data Binding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 验证过程的详细讨论，请参阅"数据验证"中[数据绑定概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Adds an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error> attached event to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 添加事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error>附加到指定的对象的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> object to add `handler` to.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> object to add `handler` to.

trans-unit.source: The handler to add.
Removes all <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"></xref> objects from the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpressionBase"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 中删除所有<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"></xref>从指定的对象<xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpressionBase"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The `bindingExpression` object may have been invalid from a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.MarkInvalid%2A> call or a previously failed validation.
trans-unit.target: `bindingExpression`对象可能已经从无效<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.MarkInvalid%2A>调用或以前失败的验证。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.MarkInvalid%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object is valid after this call.
The object to turn valid.
If bindingExpression is .
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error> attached event.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors*> attached property.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ErrorTemplate*> attached property.
To be added.
Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors*> attached property of the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 获取的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors*>附加的指定元素的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> object to read the value from.
A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyObservableCollection%601> of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"></xref> objects.
If element is .
Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ErrorTemplate*> attached property of the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 获取的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ErrorTemplate*>附加的指定元素的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ErrorTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> object to read the value from.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate"></xref> used to generate validation error feedback on the adorner layer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate"> </xref>用于生成验证错误反馈装饰器层上的。

trans-unit.source: If element is .
Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.HasError*> attached property of the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 获取的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.HasError*>附加的指定元素的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.HasError*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> object to read the value from.
The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.HasError*> attached property of the specified element.
If element is .
Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite*> attached property for the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 获取的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite*>附加指定元素的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite*>

trans-unit.source: The element from which to get the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite*>.
The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite*>.
Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor*> attached property for the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 获取的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor*>附加指定元素的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor*>

trans-unit.source: The element from which to get the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor*>.
The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor*>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.HasError*> attached property.
To be added.
Marks the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"></xref> object as invalid with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 标记指定<xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"></xref>为与指定的无效对象<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> object stays invalid until <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ClearInvalid%2A> is called or another transfer to the binding source validates successfully.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression>对象保留无效直到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ClearInvalid%2A>称为或另一个传输到绑定源验证成功。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ClearInvalid%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"></xref> object to mark as invalid.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"></xref> object to use.
If validationError is .
Adds an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error> attached event from the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 添加事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error>从指定的对象附加事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> object to remove `handler` from.
